snippet: from ctypes.wintypes import WORD, UINT, DWORD
name: WORD

snippet: from ctypes.wintypes import WCHAR as TCHAR
name: WCHAR as TCHAR

snippet:
class JOYCAPS(ctypes.Structure):
    _fields_ = [
        ('wMid', WORD),
        ('wPid', WORD),
        ('szPname', TCHAR * MAXPNAMELEN),
        ('wXmin', UINT),
        ('wXmax', UINT),
        ('wYmin', UINT),
        ('wYmax', UINT),
        ('wZmin', UINT),
        ('wZmax', UINT),
name: JOYCAPS

snippet:
class JOYINFO(ctypes.Structure):
    _fields_ = [
        ('wXpos', UINT),
        ('wYpos', UINT),
        ('wZpos', UINT),
        ('wButtons', UINT),
    ]
name: JOYINFO

snippet:
class JOYINFOEX(ctypes.Structure):
    _fields_ = [
        ('dwSize', DWORD),
        ('dwFlags', DWORD),
        ('dwXpos', DWORD),
        ('dwYpos', DWORD),
        ('dwZpos', DWORD),
        ('dwRpos', DWORD),
        ('dwUpos', DWORD),
        ('dwVpos', DWORD),
        ('dwButtons', DWORD),
name: JOYINFOEX

snippet:
class MecaJoy():
    def __init__(self):
        # Define structures
        self._joyid = 0
        self._info = JOYINFO()
        self._pinfo = ctypes.pointer(self._info)
        self._caps = JOYCAPS()
        self._pcaps = ctypes.pointer(self._caps)
        self._info = JOYINFO()
        self._infoex = JOYINFOEX()
        self._pinfoex = ctypes.pointer(self._infoex)
name: MecaJoy

snippet:
def __init__(self):
        # Define structures
        self._joyid = 0
        self._info = JOYINFO()
        self._pinfo = ctypes.pointer(self._info)
        self._caps = JOYCAPS()
        self._pcaps = ctypes.pointer(self._caps)
        self._info = JOYINFO()
        self._infoex = JOYINFOEX()
        self._pinfoex = ctypes.pointer(self._infoex)
        self._infoex.dwSize = ctypes.sizeof(JOYINFOEX)
        self._infoex.dwFlags = JOY_RETURNX | JOY_RETURNY | JOY_RETURNZ | JOY_RETURNBUTTONS
name: __init__
